items.text: and gone! A slower delivery around off, the ball cuts back in, the offcutter, Mushfiqur slogs his wicket away now. Not very clever batting. Mushfiqur charges at Chameera, doesn't get to the pitch and whacks it away straight into the hands of short midwicket
items.shortText: Chameera to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT

athlete.name: Lakshan Sandakan
athlete.fullName: Paththamperuma Arachchige Don Lakshan Rangika Sandakan

dismissal.text: Mushfiqur Rahim c Mendis b Chameera 26 (56b 1x4 0x6) SR: 46.42

items.text: leading edge but just wide of cover. Full delivery on middle and leg, he is quick through his flick, it lobs away but in front of cover

items.text: wow, how do you get out to that? A short delivery drifts down leg, Nasir looks to swivel into a pull and hit it for six, but all he can do is get a bit of bat on that. Flies to Dickwella's left, and he takes it. Would have been wide, but he wanted a boundary. 80 for 8 now
items.shortText: Chameera to Nasir Hossain, OUT

athlete.name: Lakshan Sandakan
athlete.fullName: Paththamperuma Arachchige Don Lakshan Rangika Sandakan

dismissal.text: Nasir Hossain c †Dickwella b Chameera 3 (13b 0x4 0x6) SR: 23.07

items.text: wow, a massive swing. Flight on middle and leg, Mortaza clears his front leg and looks to slog this away. But the ball turns back in, goes through a massive gap between bat and pad and hits leg stump. Not a terrible shot with the circumstances, but flawed execution
items.shortText: Sandakan to Mashrafe Mortaza, OUT

items.text: the slog sweep is taken at long-on! A googly outside off, Rubel clears his front leg and slogs the ball into the hands of long-on. Bangladesh are bowled out for 82, their ninth-lowest ODI total
items.postText: 2.10pm They didn't even bat out half the overs, 23.5 overs is all Sri Lanka needed to wrap up Bangladesh, an abject performance in their own backyard. Mushfiqur fought but there were plenty of loose strokes from Bangladesh's batsmen right through that innings. A bonus-point win for Sri Lanka is on the cards, we'll be back in about 6-8 minutes for the reply.
items.shortText: Sandakan to Rubel Hossain, OUT
